favourite.article: Heard this sweet song as a child and was delighted to find it again. What assurance it gives me as I sing those words again this morning.
LORD, in the secret of YOUR Presence.. in YOUR Presence our Beloved LORD is where we belong..
Such a refreshing song of love to our dear LORD. The simplicity, joy and true blessing of experiencing CHRIST as our SECRET PLACE. This is GRACE. Thank You JESUS!
Oh to abide in Christ! This hymn expresses the longing of my heart and the deep refreshing secret place all believers must seek to flee unto! What a fitting and lovely tune to go with it!
What a sweet song! I could not stop but singing it daily for weeks. Just love it!

My Father sang this song solo in a church in Burma when he was in the WWll. I just found out by reading letters he wrote to my Mother. I didn't know my Father sang before, I am so pleased to know he was in church and took an active part in it. I love you Dad.

I enjoy this song so much! When we go out of that happy meeting place, we have the image of our Master on our face! Praise the Lord! With Him we never need to worry, we just need to enjoy Him and trust on Him. Thank You Lord that we can bear Your image on our face! What a mercy for us to have Your image on our face! We love you Lord! You are the sweetest of all. Praise the Lord!
"In the secret of His presence how my soul delights to hide...Earthly cares can never vex me, neither trials lay me low; for when Satan comes to tempt me, to the SECRET PLACE I go."
This is one of my favorite songs that speaks of the sweetness of fellowship with the Lord. Praise the Lord!
